title.bibl: Naujienos, Jan. 14, 1915. Lectures to Americans on Lithuanian Literature

div.bibl: Naujienos, Jan. 14, 1915. LECTURES TO AMERICANS ON LITHUANIAN LITERATURE

body.p: p. 3.... Kleofas Jurgelonis read a lecture in the English language on the subject "Lithuanian Renaissance Literature" before the Chicago Women's Club in the Arts Building, Jan. 13. Over two hundred wealthy Chicago women attended the lecture. Many of them heard for the first time that there is a Lithuanian nationality in this world and that they possess a rich literature. They all enjoyed translations of Lithuanian folk songs, especially the "Raudos" (Dirges).
